website_summaries.verdict: Although it's packed with features, has powerful magnification, and an impressive amount of viewing modes, the downside is the image quality that isn't quite as sharp as competitors.
pros: Stands out from others we considered for offering 17 color viewing modes
Has video output port and rechargeable battery
Screen brightness is easy to adjust
Screen also resists fingerprints and smudges
cons: Difficult to use if not placed on a flat surface

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I have purchased for my mother. She has macular degeneration and is losing her vision. Labels, pill bottles, menus are now impossible to read. This unit has opened up her world a little more. I purchased a second one so she can keep one in her purse and one at home. She uses it many times during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Triple Threat! Great product, Great service, Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and great customer service! Product works great for smaller text found on things like ingredients on packaging, newspapers, etc. However, the viewfinder is fairly small with a min 4x zoom, so if the text is very big to start with you won’t be able to see a lot on the screen at a time. You have to place the product flat on the surface you are trying to enlarge in order for it to work properly. Overall a great product if you need something enlarged as it can lessen eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product...too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product...used it...loved it...came back to order a spare and the price almost doubled. Looking around, it appears that this product is just a rebrand but every other reseller jacked up the price as well. It's a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bradford

customer_reviews.title: It performed as advertise.
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I dislike was, in their User Manual they said it has a one year warranty, but gave no phone, no address, & no e-mail address to contact them for help or warranty claims. I guess you are on your own.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: great Video Magnifier with great price.i also call customer care because I have some question and they wear knowledgeable and very helpful.i am so happy with the device and the service.thank you Inventiv keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: moeman

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service though
customer_reviews.text: returned it.Bought for my mother who has macular degeneration in both eyes.You have to keep it on flat surface to use.Holding it up trying to read thru it made me want to throw up.Good customer service though.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but has limitations
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be flat, unlike the Pebble. You get what you pay for. This is only for reading menus or I guess the paper if you read it on a table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When your eyes aren't "so good looking" anymore
customer_reviews.text: when the eyeballs "aren't so good looking" anymore, and the magnifying glasses aren't strong enough (and ALWAYS wander off) Get a n Inventiv Video Magnifier!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Zweede-Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Good for failing eyesight
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandmother who is 90 and has poor eyesight. Helps her read papers.
customer_reviews.author: David Addison

customer_reviews.title: Warranty company
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 10 year old who was recently diagnosed legally blind. He had it for about two weeks and it stopped working. It would turn on but the screen went black. I contacted the warranty company and they responded right away. They sent me a new one with no questions asked besides the address. Great company. Two thumbs up from us! And the new one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one day
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly parent and it worked great for us for one evening, then after charging the screen comes on but doesn’t show anything—just flat white. The troubleshooting guide was useless for fixing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lawson
